content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello, Mr. Abbasi. I am not obligated to tell you my name or details about myself. We can start negotiating the rental price. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. I aim to secure the lowest possible price for this apartment in Munchen's city center. Initially offering 650 Euros per month, considering its newly built condition and proximity to essential facilities. If this price doesn't meet your expectations, please kindly suggest a fairer alternative.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: That is not a fair offer. I demand a higher price. Let's say 1000 Euros per month. That should be more in line with my expectations.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the proposed price significantly exceeds my target range for this unfurnished apartment in a prime location.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
